name: Hornblower in the West Indies
summary: Hornblower in the West Indies, or alternately Admiral Hornblower in the West Indies, is one of the novels in the series that C. S. Forester wrote about fictional Royal Navy officer Horatio Hornblower.. All the other novels in the series take place during the wars with revolutionary and Napoleonic France; this one, however, takes place when Britain is at peace, May 1821 – October 1823.
info:
• 中文名: 霍恩布洛尔在西印度
  • 册数: 1
  • 作者: C.S. Forester
  • 别名: 霍恩布洛尔上将在西印度
  • 别名: Admiral Hornblower in the West Indies
  • 发售日: 1965
